fields.name: Rent:
fields.value:
Base: $3
1 House: $9
2 Houses: $15
3 Houses: $22
4 Houses: $30

Houses cost $50 each

fields.name: Stop-in Effects:
fields.value: If a player holds a monopoly on The Slums, any player who lands here rolls a d6. If they roll a 1, they are forced to surrender a property to the owner or lose $250 + $250 x (# of houses on this property).
